name: Ken to Mahou to Gakuen Mono. Final: Shinnyusei wa Ohimesama
name_original: Ken to Mahou to Gakuen Mono. Final: Shinnyusei wa Ohimesama
description:
Ken to Mahou to Gakuen Mono. Final: Shinnyusei wa Ohimesama is an action game. It came out on 02-06-2013.
Ken to Mahou to Gakuen Mono. Final: Shinnyusei wa Ohimesama is available on PSP.
